Content.title: Jahiro
Content.name: Jahiro
Content.bodyText: Hi Darren - How so you deal with the issue that the real content originates in production and you cannot simply take a database from staging and push it to prod? The content migration is a reverse process compared to the dev migration. Umbraco looks amazing, but unless you buy a pro license and use Courier, I don't see any way to deploy from staging to live without overwriting live content.
